title: 主介面
texttw: 喂喂喂！！比賽快開始了，你還在這幹嘛？
textcn: 偎偎偎！！比賽快開始了，你還在這幹嘛？
texten: Yo~~ The game is about to start, what are you doing here?

texttw: 啊！！我剛又做了一場精彩的『籃球夢』...
textcn: 啊！！我剛又做了一場精彩的"籃球夢"...
texten: [f6f6f6] Now I will guide you step by step into the wonderful world of basketball, just follow the [66ff66] arrow [-] instructions ! [-]

texttw: 沒辦法，當年的精彩對決已經深烙在我們的腦海中了。
textcn: 沒辦法，當年的精彩對戰已經深烙在我們的腦海當中了。
texten: Can't help it! That classical match is deeply imprinted in our brain.

texttw: 好了好了！！別再拖拖拉拉，我們再不報到就要被迫棄權了喔！！
textcn: 別再拖拖拉拉的，我們再不報到就要被迫棄權了！！
texten: Hey, stop messing around! If we don't register soon we'll be forced to forfeit!!

texttw: 好啦，走吧！！
texten: Fine fine, let's go!

texttw: 先進入[ff6060]生涯競賽[-]
texten: Click the Story Buttom.

texttw: 再來選擇第一場競賽。
texten: Click the next buttom.

texttw: 確認這場比賽的獲勝條件之後，就可以繼續進入下一步了。
texten: Checking the mission details .

texttw: 這裡是你這場比賽的隊友，確認完畢就可以開始競賽了
texten: Click the Next button.

title: Skill
texttw: 剛剛獲得到一張[ff6060]技能卡片[-]，這是幹嘛的呀？
textcn: [f6f6f6]哈啰～欢迎来到[ff6060]『决战篮球』[-]。我是你的球队经理—[66ff66]Jessica～[-]
texten: Just received a [ff6060]ability chip[-]，what is this for？

texttw: [ff6060]技能卡片[-]是運用科技，讓我們能夠獲得超乎常人的能力，
texten: [ff6060]ability chip[-]uses technology to provide us exceptional performance.

texttw: 如果這個卡片運用得當，將對比賽的結果造成決定性的影響。
texten: If you can utilize this well, it can change the outcome of the game.

texttw: 我來教你怎麼安裝它。
textcn: [f6f6f6]哈啰～欢迎来到[ff6060]『决战篮球』[-]。我是你的球队经理—[66ff66]Jessica～[-]
texten: Let me teach you how to install it.

texttw: 技能卡片分為[ff6060]主動技[-]跟[ff6060]被動技[-]，
texten: Ability chips can be divided into[ff6060]Active[-]and[ff6060]Proactive Abilities[-]，

texttw: 只要將擁有的技能卡片[ff6060]拖曳[-]到對應的[ff6060]右側欄位[-]中即可完成安裝，
texten: Use the chip[ff6060]and drag it[-]to the matching[ff6060]right column[-]to complete the install，

texttw: [f6f6f6]找出最適合的搭配將對你的旅程有絕佳的幫助喔。
texten: [f6f6f6]finding the best combo will provide great benefit to your journey!

title: Avatar
texttw: [f6f6f6]快來搭配屬於自己的[ff6060]造型特色吧[-]，
textcn: [f6f6f6]哈啰～欢迎来到[ff6060]『决战篮球』[-]。我是你的球队经理—[66ff66]Jessica～[-]
texten: [f6f6f6]mix and show your[ff6060]unique style[-]，

textcn: [f6f6f6]哈啰～欢迎来到[ff6060]『决战篮球』[-]。我是你的球队经理—[66ff66]Jessica～[-]
texten: [f6f6f6] Hello ~ Welcome to [ff6060] "Gang of basketballers" [-]. I'm your team manager - [66ff66] Jessica ~ [-]

texttw: 選擇衣服種類。
texten: Click the clothes buttom.

texttw: 造型服裝都有限定的[ff6060]時限[-]，除非把它買下來，否則時間到期就不能再穿了。
texten: These style and equipments all have a limited sample[ff6060]period[-]，unless you buy it now, it will expire at that time。

texttw: 而且買新造型還可以增加自己的[ff6060]潛能[-]喔！！
texten: Purchasing new stle will increase[ff6060]talent points[-]！！

texttw: 點擊[ff6060]衣服圖示[-]就可以把它穿起來了！！
texten: Tap[ff6060]icon[-]to equip it！！

title: 裝備
texttw: 良好的配件有助於我們取得更好的成績，
texten: Great gear will give us a great boost

texttw: 快把我們剛剛獲得的配件給穿起來吧！！
texten: Let's put on the gear we just got！！

texttw: 有更強的裝配可以替換。
texten: Let's change better equiptment.

texttw: 接下來選擇剛剛獲得的服裝即可穿上！！
texten: Select the gear you got to equip it!

texttw: 有沒有感覺自己的能力又更上一層了呢？
texten: Can feel the difference can't ya?

title: 第一關
texttw: 只剩下最後的10秒鐘了，我們還落後7分，必須要好好把握這次發球的機會才行。
texten: 10 seconds left and we are still behind by 7, we must seize this possession

texttw: 現在只能靠你的得分能力才有機會扭轉戰局了！！！
texten: we have to count on your scoring bility now in order to turn the tide!

texttw: 好！只能這樣做了...來吧！！！
texten: Aite! Just got to get down to business now!

texttw: 先來顆神準三分球！！
texten: Hit a clutch 3 point shot!

title: 第一關
texttw: 剛剛的三分球讓我增加滿滿的能量，現在可以使用絕技了！！
texten: That 3 gave me full energy and confidence, I can use the ability chip now!!

texttw: 時間來不及了，看來只能使用瞬間抄球技能。
texten: We are running out of time, must use the blink steal ability.

title: 第一關
texttw: 快！！！把握機會！！
texten: Hurry! Now is the time!

texttw: 發動終極灌籃絕招來結束這場比賽吧。
texten: Activate ultimate slam to end this game for good!

title: 第二關
texttw: 呼，上一場比賽真是好險，多虧你關鍵的絕殺灌籃。
texten: Damn, that was a crazy game!  Thanks to your clutch moves!

texttw: 妳客氣了，籃球是團隊合作的運動，勝利是靠大家一起取得的。
texten: Nah, basketball is a team sport, it was a team victory.

texttw: 說到團結合作，在混亂的競賽中為了能夠便於分辨敵我，所以我們用了[ff6666]紅[-]、[6666ff]藍[-]、[66ff66]綠[-]三色的投射燈來代表我方球員。
texten: Speaking of teamwork, in order to distinquish teammates and opponents, we use[ff6666]red[-]、[6666ff]blue[-]、[66ff66]green[-]colours to represent our players.

texttw: [ff6666]紅[-]投射燈的球員即代表是[fff400]你自己[-]。
texten: [ff6666]red[-]player represents[fff400]you[-]。

texttw: [ff6666]紅[-][6666ff]藍[-][66ff66]綠[-]三種投射燈也分別對應[fff400]傳球[-]的三顆按鈕，點擊該顏色的按鈕即可將球傳到該為球員手中。
texten: [ff6666]red[-][6666ff]blue[-][66ff66]green[-]buttons are also used for[fff400]passing[-]to each respective players。

texttw: 靈活運用[fff400]傳球按鈕[-]來製造最佳的團隊配合吧！
texten: utilize[fff400]passing[-]going from good shot to great shot！

texttw: 原來如此，我們立即來試試吧！！
texten: I see! Let's give it a shot！！

texttw: 現在是一個發動[fff400]快攻[-]的大好機會，快叫你的隊友把球傳給你。
texten: It is a grea time to initiate[fff400]fast break[-]get ready to catch the pass from your teammate。

texttw: 趕快把握空檔機會[fff400]灌籃[-]！！！！！
texten: Shoot the gap for the[fff400]slam[-]！！！！！
Yes!!!

texttw: 幹得好！！只要在靠近籃下的地方投籃，都會有[fff400]機率[-]發動[fff400]灌籃[-]喔。
texten: Great job! Anytime you shoot near the basket there is a [fff400]percentage to[-]initiate[fff400]dunk attempt[-].

texttw: 接下來我們來個漂亮的[fff400]抄截[-]嚇嚇他們吧！！
texten: Let's aim for a great[fff400]steal[-]and surprise them！

texttw: 你先偷偷靠近他們的持球者吧！！
texten: Get close to the ball handler！！

texttw: 趁他還在發呆，直接[fff400]抄球[-]吧，不用客氣了。
texten: The player isn't looking[fff400]steal it now[-]don't feel sorry about it.

texttw: 哈哈，太容易了，再順便送他們一個[fff400]絕殺灌籃[-]吧！！！
texten: That was easy!  Here, take this[fff400]ultimate dunk[-]！！！

title: 第三關
texttw: 經過了兩場的激戰，對手已經被你優秀的得分能力給震懾。
texten: After two great battles your scoring ability has shocked the world

title: 第三關
texttw: 哈哈哈！！其實是他們太弱了！！
texten: It wan't all me, the opponent is simply not at the same level!

texttw: 所以接下來要找[fff400]強勁[-]一點的對手來挑戰看看了。
texten: Time to find a better[fff400]opponent[-]for some serious challenge.

texttw: 好啊，放馬過來！！
texten: Come on! Show me what you got!

texttw: 糟糕，被騙了，被敵對球員包夾！！！
texten: Damn, got tricked into a trap！！！

texttw: 別怕，在競賽中常常會遇到被對手包夾的狀況
texten: Don't worry, this happens all the time

texttw: 這時候，可以使出[fff400]肘擊[-]來保護自己的球，防止對方靠近！！
texten: This is a great time to use[fff400]elbow[-]to prevent your opponent from getting too close and protect your basketball！！

texttw: 好，我來試試！！
texten: Ok! I'll give it a try!

texttw: 這樣是不是少了很多[fff400]阻礙[-]，
texten: See? now there is much less[fff400]resistance[-]！？

texttw: 快把球傳給我，我來給他們致命一擊！！！
texten: Pass me the ball, I'll give them the fatal blow!!

texttw: 看妳的了！
texten: All yours!

texttw: 禁區已沒有敵對防守球員，此時可以[fff400]指揮隊友[-]進行射籃了！
texten: There isn't anyone near the basket, command[fff400]teamate[-]to take the shot！

texttw: 切記，適時的指揮隊友進攻，將可以創造更有效率地得分。
texten: Remember, directing your teammates to the right direction can help the team score efficiently.

texttw: 這場競賽我們必須要達成限定的[fff400]灌籃次數[-]，才可以取得這個關卡的勝利，
texten: In this level we have to reach[fff400]duncks[-]to beat this level

texttw: 條件有點困難，所以要記得要好好利用剛剛所安裝的技能卡片喔！！
texten: This criteria seems a little challenging, remember to use the ability chip！！

texttw: 戰況有些膠著，我們要好好把握這次的進攻！！
texten: The score has been tight, we must execute better on every possession!

texttw: 適時的喊話讓士氣提升了不少耶。
texten: The score has been tight, we must execute better on every possession!

texttw: 這場比賽所需要的[fff400]3分球[-]數量比上一場更多，
texten: This level will require[fff400]3 Point Shots[-]which is more than last game

texttw: 上一場就已經打得如此辛苦了，這一場的條件還更嚴苛...
texten: Last level was tough one and you are raising the bar?...

texttw: 別擔心，這次我們的另一個夥伴是一個3分球神射手，
texten: Don't worry, this time your teammate will be a well known 3 Point shooter

texttw: 我們把機會做給他吧！！
texten: Let's set up the shots for him!

texttw: 好！！就這麼辦！！
texten: Great!  Let's do this!
